title: Kindle Publishing 2019 - How Does Amazon Rank Your Books? - Amazon Algorithm Explained

tactics.name: metadata alignment
tactics.description: Align book metadata (title, keywords, categories) with target keywords to improve relevance and conversion rates
source_quotes: if your book title is ketogenic diet it's relevant... if your book title is Paleo diet it doesn't really make sense

tactics.name: Keyword Alignment
tactics.description: Ensure title, subtitle, and seven keywords are relevant and congruent to target specific niches.
steps: Avoid irrelevant keywords like 'vegan' for a 'ketogenic diet' book
caveats: Keyword stuffing with irrelevant terms may harm relevance
source_quotes: if you're making a ketogenic diet book you want to probably put like low carb high protein... in the seven keywords section

tactics.name: Consistent Sales Strategy
tactics.description: Prioritize slow, steady sales over sudden spikes to maintain long-term visibility.
steps: Avoid relying on short-term traffic spikes
caveats: Sudden spikes may cause temporary drops in rankings
source_quotes: it's better to have slow consistent sales rather than sudden spikes

heuristics.name: review threshold boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting
source_quotes: conversion rate... everything must be aligned

heuristics.name: Review-Driven Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting visibility
source_quotes: it's better to have consistent sales ish I had books... stuck on page one for a really really long time

claims.statement: New books receive a 30-day ranking boost
source_quotes: new books gets a boost... 30 days after the book is released

claims.statement: Amazon prioritizes customer relevance over publisher preferences.
source_quotes: Amazon cares about customers way more than publishers

claims.statement: Consistent sales outperform sudden spikes in long-term rankings.
source_quotes: it's better to have slow consistent sales rather than sudden spikes

niche_patterns.description: Niche targeting combines specific audience identity with problem and constraint for better market focus
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages low competition and targeted relevance
source_quotes: people who search for vegan diet are looking for vegan diet... they're not gonna buy your ketogenic diet books
